articles.title: Woman who raised red flags about suspected Trump shooter slams authorities' response
articles.description: Some people who expressed their concerns about Ryan Routh, the man accused of of trying to kill Donald Trump in Florida earlier this month, are wondering if more could've been done to protect the former president.
articles.content:
A woman who raised concerns about Trump assassination suspect Ryan Routh to U.S. authorities over two years ago, said more could’ve been done to protect the former president.

articles.description: The comment was notable as Donald Trump seemed to rule out another bid and as he rarely admits the possibility he could legitimately lose an election.
articles.content:
Former US president Donald Trump has said he does not “think” he would run again for president in 2028 if he falls short in his bid to return to the White House in 2024.

articles.title: Trump Campaigns in North Carolina Amid Controversy Over Ally
articles.description: Donald Trump campaigned in North Carolina without his embattled Republican ally, Mark Robinson, amid controversy over Robinson's past inflammatory comments. As the election nears, Republicans worry the scandal could impact Trump's chances in the crucial battleground state.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Missed Warnings: The Case of Ryan Routh and the Attempted Assassination of Trump
articles.description: Ryan Routh has been accused of attempting to assassinate former President Donald Trump. Despite multiple tips to US government agencies about Routh's violent and erratic behavior, including threats against President Putin, little was done to scrutinize him further. Now, authorities are being questioned about their vigilance.
articles.content: Authorities received at least four tips about Ryan Routh's actions before he allegedly attempted to assassinate former President Donald Trump. Despite warnings to agencies like the FBI and State Department, little seems to have been done to scrutiniz... [421 chars]
